summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ENT Solutions Voice AI Agent Platform admin functionality. Backend APIs are working correctly (96.2% success rate), but frontend login authentication is broken preventing full UI testing.

minor_bugs.issue: Health check endpoint returns redirect loops (30+ redirects)

critical_bugs.issue: Login form accepts credentials but doesn't redirect to dashboard after successful submission
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks all admin panel testing - users cannot log in

integration_issues.issue: Frontend login form not properly integrating with backend auth API

passed_tests: Regular user admin access denied (403 response)
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix frontend login authentication flow. The login form accepts credentials but doesn't redirect users to dashboard after successful login. Backend APIs are working correctly, so the issue is in the frontend authentication integration. This blocks all admin panel UI testing.
